photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user was created.

JournalEntry.title: Journal Entry
JournalEntry.description: A single journal entry for a user.

title.description: The title of the journal entry.

content.description: The main content of the journal entry.

mood.description: The user's mood when writing the entry.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the entry was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the entry was last updated.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this entry.

status.description: The status of the journal entry.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information about a user. Only accessible by the owner.

/users/{userId}/journals/{journalId}.description: Stores a user's journal entries. Only accessible by the owner.
